item.description:
Sunday, February 27, 2011
Casey Theatre at Regis College
235 Wellesley Street, Weston
1:30 & 3:30pm


Tickets are $12 for kids/$18 for adults.
To buy tickets online, click on the links below the theatre information. To buy tickets via phone, call BLO’s Audience Services at 617.542.6772 Monday–Friday 10am–5pm.

more information:

http://www.blo.org/fa...

group.name: Families with Russian Kids, Moms Club, Playgroups

item.name: Hansel and Gretel - by Boston Lyric Opera - February 27, 2011 at Regis College
